SEARCH
Package com.example.lotteryeventapp

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryeventapp.Event
public class Event extends Object
This class contains all of the information and functionality of an Event

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(String date_time, String location, String registration_deadline, String details, boolean track_geolocation, boolean will_automatically_redraw, int waitlist_limit, int attendee_limit)
      Creates an Event
      Parameters:
      date_time - date and time of the Event
      location - location of the Event
      registration_deadline - registration deadline of an event
      details - details and information about an Event such as: topic, difficulty, age range etc.
      track_geolocation - whether the Event would like to track the waitlist Entrants location
      will_automatically_redraw - whether the Event will immediately redraw an Entrant from the waitlist to be added to the invited list
      waitlist_limit - maximum amount of Entrants in a waitlist
      attendee_limit - maximum amount of Entrant that will attend the event

    • handleInvitationCancelled

      adds an Entrant to the invited list
      Parameters:
      cancelledEntrant - Entrant to be added to the invited list

    • doLottery

      public void doLottery()
      Conducts a lottery draw: randomly selects a number of entrants from the waitlist (up to available attendee spots), removes them from the waitlist, and moves them to the invited list.

    • isDrawn

      public boolean isDrawn()
      tells whether the Event has already drawn names yet
      Returns:
      whether the Event has already drawn names

      public void setDrawn(boolean drawn)
      sets whether the Event has drawn names
      Parameters:

    • editEvent

      public void editEvent(String date_time, String location, String registration_deadline, String details, boolean track_geolocation, boolean will_automatically_redraw, int waitlist_limit, int attendee_limit)
      edits the information about an existing Event
      Parameters:
      date_time - date and time of the Event
      location - location of the Event
      registration_deadline - registration deadline of an event
      details - details and information about an Event such as: topic, difficulty, age range etc.
      track_geolocation - whether the Event would like to track the waitlist Entrants location
      will_automatically_redraw - whether the Event will immediately redraw an Entrant from the waitlist to be added to the invited list
      waitlist_limit - maximum amount of Entrants in a waitlist
      attendee_limit - maximum amount of Entrant that will attend the event
